problem.markdown:
>>Didymo (Rock Snot) can be found in streams:<< (x) on the bottom of the stream bed () suspended in the flow of the stream () in industrial areas () suspended in grass along the banks () floating in clumps on the surface
[explanation]
Didymo (Rock Snot) grows on the bottom of both flowing and still bodies of water. It is characterized by the development of thick mat-like growths (blooms) on rocks in the stream bed.
[explanation]
problem.p: Didymo (Rock Snot) can be found in streams:

choicegroup.label: Didymo (Rock Snot) can be found in streams:
choicegroup.choice: on the bottom of the stream bed
suspended in the flow of the stream
suspended in grass along the banks
floating in clumps on the surface

div.p: Didymo (Rock Snot) grows on the bottom of both flowing and still bodies of water. It is characterized by the development of thick mat-like growths (blooms) on rocks in the stream bed.
